checkers.flow

Class DefaultFlow<ST extends DefaultFlowState>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.source.util.TreeScanner<R,P>
      • com.sun.source.util.TreePathScanner<@Nullable Void,@Nullable Void>
        • checkers.flow.AbstractFlow<ST>
          • checkers.flow.DefaultFlow<ST>
  • Type Parameters:
    ST - the flow state subclass that should be used. If DefaultFlow is instantiated directly the type argument has to be DefaultFlowState. In other cases, method createFlowState has to be overridden correctly!
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Flow, TreeVisitor<@Nullable Void,@Nullable Void>

    public class DefaultFlow<ST extends DefaultFlowState>
extends AbstractFlow<ST>
    The default implementation of the flow-sensitive type inference.
